root: ^Thank you Joe on exploring planet Ara. You found the shield generator which has now given you shields all around your ship to stop any danger happening or any new life forms trying to attack your ship.

c-0: ^We have discovered that the red ship has been seen to be complaining they need a bigger boat as they got shipwrecked in the water.
^They have been seen going through the asteroids so take these shield generators so you can make it out alive.

^Our next mission for you Joe is to explore 2 more planets through the asteroids. The planets are located beyond the hyperdrive. Make sure you stay alert as these planets have not been researched yet.
